channel.title: vsphere 5 on DefinIT
channel.description: Recent content in vsphere 5 on DefinIT

item.title: VCP5 – vSphere 5 Configuration Maximums Quiz in PowerShell
item.description: I’ve been learning my vSphere 5 config maximums before my upcoming VCP5 exam, so in a supreme effort of procrastination I thought I’d write a PowerShell quiz script: here it is! Save the QuizMe.ps1 file into a folder and then place one or more text file in the same folder containing a comma delimited set of questions and answers. Then run QuizMe.ps1! You can choose the quiz you take (which text file it will use).
